response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which we believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and utility, we understand its true worth to be $1,500,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you, aiming to make this opportunity more accessible. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,400,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring that you receive the best possible value while allowing me to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to discussing the details further and potentially bringing this product to your organization.", "product_price": 1400000}
